attributes.description: Dealer demo, Balance of 5 year / Unlimited mileage factory warranty, Balance of 2 year / 30 000 kms factory service plan, KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership

attributes.description: We at KIA RANDBURG pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.
